Activity: Log in to the system, check emails, and address any urgent issues.
Analyze data and reports from the testing team to identify defects. Prioritize the defects to be addressed.
Meet with @ehrdev-1 and @ehrdev-2 to discuss the defects and develop a plan for fixing them.
Work with the developers to verify that the defects have been resolved and the system is functioning as expected. Retest the fixed components thoroughly.
Refine the training plan based on defect resolution. Include best practices and common troubleshooting tips.
Work with @dba-1 to ensure that the database is performing as expected. Review database optimization techniques to improve data retrieval and storage.
Test the functionality of the prompts in the production environment. Report any issues immediately. Coordinate with IT and development teams to ensure smooth deployment.
Inform the Help Desk Support team about the changes and provide guidance on how to resolve user issues related to the prompts and workflows. @PEOPLE: Send email to helpdesk.
Prepare a detailed report on the progress of the project and upcoming milestones for the IT Project Manager.
